'''Pel''' can refer to:

*''[[pel-]]'', a [[Quenya]] word
*''[[pêl]]'', a [[Noldorin]] word
*[[PEL]], an [[Elvish]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying "edge, bound, fence, limit"
*[[PEL#Other verions|PEL-, PEL(ES)-]], [[Elvish]] [[Sundocarme|roots]] from the ''[[The Etymologies|Etymologies]]''
